item.description: Welcome to “Decode and Deploy”â€”a blog where I dive into the complexities of bioinformatics, sharing the systems and insights that helped me in my research and teaching. My name is Kesava Asam, I am a Bioinformatician working in academia, where I focus on developing reproducible bioinformatics pipelines, easy to interpret graphs and results.
